com.tineye.services
Class MetadataRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.tineye.services.TinEyeServiceRequest
      com.tineye.services.MetadataRequest
Direct Known Subclasses:
MulticolorEngineRequest
public class MetadataRequest
extends TinEyeServiceRequest

Provides methods to call the TinEye Service API methods that deal with searching and tagging images with metadata.

Copyright (C) 2011-2012 Idee Inc. All rights reserved worldwide.

Constructor Summary

          Construct a MetadataRequest instance to issue HTTP requests using HTTP basic authentication to a specific TinEye Services API that supports image metadata.

Method Detail

addImage

public net.sf.json.JSONObject addImage(Image[] images,
                                       boolean ignoreBackground,
                                       boolean ignoreInteriorBackground)
                                throws TinEyeServiceException
Add the images in images to the hosted image collection using the image data.

If the images have JSON metadata, add the images to the collection with the metadata. If metadata is included, each image must have metadata or the API will return an error.

If the ignoreBackground option is set to true, an image region containing 75% or more of the image's edge pixels is considered a background region and its associated color is disgarded by the add call.

Returns the API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: add
  • result: Empty array
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
images - List of images to add to the hosted image collection
ignoreBackground - If true, ignore the background color of the images If false, include the background color of the images
ignoreInteriorBackground - If true, ignore regions that have the same color as the background region but that are surrounded by non-background regions.
Returns:
The API JSON response with the status of the image addition
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the API add request or parsing the response

addURL

public net.sf.json.JSONObject addURL(Image[] images,
                                     boolean ignoreBackground,
                                     boolean ignoreInteriorBackground)
                              throws TinEyeServiceException
Add the images in images to the hosted image collection using their URLs.

Each Image in images must have a URL and collection filepath set.

If the images have JSON metadata, add the images to the collection with the metadata. If metadata is included, each image must have metadata or the API will return an error.

If the ignoreBackground option is set to true, an image region containing 75% or more of the image's edge pixels is considered a background region and its associated color is disgarded by the add call.

Returns the API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: add
  • result: Empty array
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
images - List of images with URLs and collection filepaths to add to the hosted image collection
ignoreBackground - If true, ignore the background color of the images If false, include the background color of the images
ignoreInteriorBackground - If true, ignore regions that have the same color as the background region but that are surrounded by non-background regions.
Returns:
The API JSON response with the status of the image addition
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the API add request or parsing the response

getMetadata

public net.sf.json.JSONObject getMetadata(java.lang.String[] filepaths)
                                   throws TinEyeServiceException
Get the keywords from the index associated with the images with the given collection image filepaths.

Returns the API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: get_metadata
  • result: Array of JSON objects for each match with the following fields:
    • filepath: The collection match filepath
    • metadata: JSON object with the keywords associated with the image
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
filepaths - List of collection image filepaths to retrieve keywords for
Returns:
The API JSON response with the image keywords
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the API get_metadata request or parsing the response

getSearchMetadata

public net.sf.json.JSONObject getSearchMetadata()
                                         throws TinEyeServiceException
Get the metadata tree structure that can be searched.

Returns the API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: get_search_metadata
  • result: Array with a single JSON object containing the metadata tree structure that can be searched also including the keyword type and number of images in the index associated with that keyword
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Returns:
The API JSON response with the searchable metadata tree structure
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the API get_search_metadata request or parsing the response

getReturnMetadata

public net.sf.json.JSONObject getReturnMetadata()
                                         throws TinEyeServiceException
Get the metadata that can be returned by a search method along with each match.

Returns the API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: get_return_metadata
  • result: Array with a single JSON object containing the keywords that can be returned along with the data type and count of images in the index that have that keyword for each keyword
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Returns:
The API JSON response with the metadata available to return with search results
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the API get_return_metadata request or parsing the response

updateMetadata

public net.sf.json.JSONObject updateMetadata(java.lang.String[] filepaths,
                                             net.sf.json.JSONObject[] metadata)
                                      throws TinEyeServiceException
Update the metadata for a list of images already present in the hosted image collection.

Note there must be one metadata entry for each image filepath passed in.

Returns the MulticolorEngine API JSON response with the following fields:

  • status: One of ok, warn, or fail
  • method: update_metadata
  • result: Empty array.
  • error: Array of error messages if status is not ok

Parameters:
filepaths - Array of hosted image filepaths to update metadata for.
metadata - The metadata entries to associate with each image filepath.
Returns:
The API JSON response.
Throws:
TinEyeServiceException - If an exception occurs issuing the API update_metadata request or parsing the response
